topic.title: ERR0R search now Rabbit Search
topic.body:
ERR0R search name has been changed to RabbitSearch.
New: New UI + New Rabbit Search logo.
Links are now visible & clickable.
Searchbar & banner now working in mobile.
Tagging system, a page with apropriate tags for your site, just copy the tags when indexing an url in Rabbit Search or anywhere in zeronet.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1P126oKU9cQSH2g4EdyE53PJ1hxmV4DfyN

2_1MA9FAQkvuKGyyr29ecGJ3FtMjPKBtJhpU.body:
> [dbene](#comment_1_1Hk3VC1SpvpXdhSYFPsQRowJC1mDnWESoX): I'm assuming that when the box pops up saying "ERR0R - SearchEngine based on ZeroTalk" that means no content found.

Thats weird, its not empty, theres definitely some content there.
What browser are you using? i tested it on multiple devices and all are working fine.
I noticed that some browser are having issues with some zeronet pages for example edge.

> [wired](#comment_1_1MA9FAQkvuKGyyr29ecGJ3FtMjPKBtJhpU): Thats weird, its not empty, theres definitely some content there.What browser are you using? i tested it on multiple devices and all are working fine.I noticed that some browser are having issues with some zeronet pages for example edge.

edit: now the site is down again, for some reason the site functions for a few days then it just breaks out of nowhere :(
